import { useContext } from 'react'; import {Grid,File,Book,List,Clock,X} from 'react-feather' import ChatContext from '../../helpers/chatContext'; const AppList = (props) => { const {CloseAppSidebar,toggleSmallSide} = useContext(ChatContext); return (
  • CloseAppSidebar(toggleSmallSide)}>
    Apps
  • props.ToggleTab("file")}>
    Files
  • props.ToggleTab("notes")}>
    Notes
  • props.ToggleTab("todo")}>
    Todo
  • props.ToggleTab("reminder")}>
    Reminder
  • props.CloseAppSidebar()} >
    close
); } export default AppList;
